entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
